title: Add 'devansh shukla 6B AF PANCHWATI' to front page

requirements.text: Add the text 'devansh shukla 6B AF PANCHWATI' to the front page (LawsPage) of the application in a prominent, visible location above or near the laws list

quotes: Add devansh shukla 6B AF PANCHWATI to front page of my app

acceptanceCriteria: The text 'devansh shukla 6B AF PANCHWATI' is displayed on the front page (LawsPage)
The text is clearly visible and positioned prominently
The text styling is consistent with the app's burgundy and gold legal theme

constraints: Preserve the existing burgundy and gold color scheme
Do not modify the laws list functionality or existing layout structure
Do not change backend data structures or logic
nonGoals: Adding this text to other pages besides the front page
Making the text interactive or clickable
Creating a new backend data model for this text
